arts.ttl: Neymar is among the players protesting the use of artificial turf pitches in Brazil
arts.sum: Neymar, Memphis Depay and Thiago Silva are among the leading Brazilian footballers protesting against using artificial turf for league matches instead of natural grass. In the most respected leagues in the world, players are heard and investments are made to ensure the quality of the pitch in the stadiums,” the footballers said in a statement.

arts.ttl: 'Ludicrous' Neymar party clause revealed as former Barcelona ace gifted rare contract leeway
arts.sum: The Brazilian was a big hit on the pitch in Spain - with many privileges granted off it

arts.ttl: Tuesday's Transfer Talk Update: Deivid Washington, Neymar, Benjamin Sesko
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest confirmed transfer news and speculation from across the footballing world.

arts.ttl: Chelsea medical scheduled as Romano confirms SHOCK Neymar link-up
arts.sum: Chelsea attacker Deivid Washington is set to undergo a medical ahead of his return to Santos, according to Fabrizio Romano. According to Fabrizio Romano, Washington will undergo his Santos medical 'in the coming days' and then link up with Brazilian megastar Neymar at his boyhood club.

arts.ttl: Watch: Ex-Barcelona star Neymar’s silky run & first goal since return to Santos
arts.sum: Former Barcelona star Neymar Jr. enjoyed an outing to remember over the weekend. This came as the 33-year-old got his goalscoring account up and running following his return to boyhood…

arts.ttl: Chelsea transfer news: 19-year-old 'to undergo medical' ahead of Neymar loan link-up
arts.sum: Chelsea 19-year-old Deivid Washington is reportedly set to undergo a medical with Santos ahead of a loan move to the Brazilian giants for the second half of the season.

arts.ttl: Neymar’s father speaks out amid Barcelona return links
arts.sum: The father of ex-Barcelona star Neymar Jr. has indirectly shut down rumours surrounding a potential return to the Camp Nou in the summer. The name of wide-man Neymar has of…

arts.ttl: Neymar 'rediscovering joy' back at boyhood-club Santos
arts.sum: Neymar says Santos are helping him to "rediscover joy" after returning to his boyhood club on a short-term contract.

arts.ttl: Neymar contradicts father after SURPRISE transfer admission
arts.sum: Transfer speculation that swirled around the player for months even before he completed the move has only continued as Neymar only signed a short-term deal with Santos. Rumours that he could leave for MLS or make a return to European football, particularly Barcelona, have persisted and the 33-year-old has refused to shoot these down just after his father had indicated that he could remain with Santos for the long term.

arts.ttl: Neymar scores first goal after Santos return
arts.sum: Neymar scores a penalty and sets up another goal as Santos beat Agua Santa 3-1 in the Campeonato Paulista, striking for the first time in his second stint at the club.
